name: Shooting Jet
description:
Move the Jet
Shoot the Ball
choose the Cannon
buff the fire
kill the time
have the fun

Game Features :
- Unlock the cannon to destroy the balls
- Infinite level, play game to kill time
- Smooth and simple game control
- Easy to start, hard to master
- Gain Golds anytime without attention.


How to play:
- Swipe your finger to Move Jet auto shoot auto
- Unlock the cannons and Gain gold to Upgrade it.
- Challenge with your friends.

How long can you survive? Play it now!
